entities.name: purple wax seal
entities.description: The purple wax seal is described as bearing a coat of arms, indicating its importance or significance.

entities.name: lion
entities.description: A lion is mentioned as part of the coat of arms on the purple wax seal.

entities.name: eagle
entities.description: An eagle is also mentioned as part of the coat of arms on the purple wax seal.

entities.name: badger
entities.description: A badger is mentioned as part of the coat of arms on the purple wax seal.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A snake is mentioned as part of the coat of arms on the purple wax seal.

entities.name: letter ‘H’
entities.description: The letter ‘H’ is described as being surrounded by a lion, an eagle, a badger and a snake on the purple wax seal.

entities.name: Uncle Vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as shouting from the kitchen to Harry.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the recipient of a letter and is interacting with Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as being informed by Uncle Vernon about Marge's illness.

entities.name: Marge
entities.description: Marge is mentioned as being ill and having eaten a funny whelk.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon shouts at Harry from the kitchen.
Uncle Vernon informs Aunt Petunia about Marge's illness.
